participant_1.name: Frank Miller
participant_1.personality: Easygoing and sociable, he enjoys sharing stories from his life and finding humor in everyday situations.
participant_1.background: i've been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i like to grill outdoors.

participant_2.name: Isabella Martinez
participant_2.personality: Passionate and adventurous, she has a zest for life and enjoys exploring different cultures through travel and cuisine.
participant_2.background: i visit europe twice a year. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i love to cook paella. i've a weakness for fish and chips. i am an art major in college.
